STUB:
Override the rig used for this individual based on priority (see assets\data\generation\rigs.json) Will search for class and body-type specific versions first, appending Warrior/Hunter/Mystic/Farmer and M/F to the id.

For example, if RIG is "myRig" and the hero is a male warrior, in order it'll search for myRigWarriorM > myRigWarrior > myRigM > myRig
